textBox.richText: Laurent El Shafey has joined the biometrics group at Idiap in January to work on Face Recognition. Before coming to Switzerland, Laurent received a B.S. and M.S. degree from Supelec in France, a "Grande Ecole" of engineering in the forefront of Energy and Information Science. He next received a M.S. degree in computer science from the Technische Universität Darmstadt, Germany. There, he did his master thesis in the Multimodal Interactive Systems group headed by Prof. Bernt Schiele, working on Pedestrian Detection on Onboard Video Data. Laurent is going to work on Face Recognition using Invariant Visual Features in the framework of the recent Marie-Curie funded project on Bayesian Biometrics for Forensics. Welcome Laurent !
Laurent El Shafey joined the team
